cab.content: SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - MORNING - MAY 11th, 19.18.1* Our troops who had advanced their lino slightly in AVELUY WOOD as a result of a minor operation carried out yesterday; were compelled to fall hack to their original positions.2. On the rest of the front the situation remains unchanged.General Staff,War Office, S*VM.11th May; 1918,Issued at 18*10 p*rti.the personal information of the Minister only, -
